title.value: Tipy iz zapisok okhotnika I.S. Turgeneva v siluėtakh / Eliz. Bem

subject.value: Turgenev, Ivan Sergeevich, 1818-1883. Zapiski okhotnika -- Illustrations
Country life -- Russia -- 19th century -- Pictorial works

relation.value: Rare Books Published in Imperial and early Soviet Russia

description.value: Silhouette illustrations by Elizaveta Bem, inspired by Ivan Turgenev's Zapiski okhotnika, which is most commonly translated as "Sketches from a Hunter's Album," or "Sportsman's Notebook"
